mapper.select: SELECT IDX AS IDX , TITLE AS TITLE , PRODUCTOR AS PRODUCTOR , GENRE AS GENRE , DIRECTOR AS DIRECTOR , STATE AS STATE , CODE AS CODE , ACTORS AS ACTORS FROM T_MOVIE WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY IDX DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MOVIE (TITLE, PRODUCTOR, GENRE, DIRECTOR, STATE, CODE, ACTORS) VALUES (#{title}, #{productor}, #{genre}, #{director}, #{state}, #{code}, #{actors})
